{{ teamMember.name }}

{{ teamMember.role }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ngb-card} from '@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-our-team', templateUrl: './our-team.component.html', styleUrls: ['./our-team.component.css'] }) export class OurTeamComponent { teamMembers = [ { name: 'John Doe', photo: 'assets/team/john-doe.jpg', role: 'CEO' }, { name: 'Jane Smith', photo: 'assets/team/jane-smith.jpg', role: 'CTO' }, { name: 'Bob Johnson', photo: 'assets/team/bob-johnson.jpg', role: 'Developer' } ]; }
